string.text: Marry Anyone
Very Easy - no mini-game | Easy - mini-game nobles only | Realistic - mini-game all
Sexual Orientation
Player character can choose what gender the player can marry
Player character can have polygamous relationships
Player character's spouses can have relationships with each other
Player character can have incestuous relationships
Displays mod developer debug information in the game's message log
Kingdom Ruler Marriage
Player character can enrol any character in his party and have sexual relation with
Relationship Options
Player can adopt children in towns and villages
Adoption Chance
Chance that a child is up for adoption
Adoption Titles
Encyclopedia displays children without a parent as adopted
Retry Courtship
Player can retry courtship after failure
Spouse(s) join arena
Spouse will join arena with you
Can join upper clan through MA Path
Can join upper clan through MA Path (Not compatible with Calradia Expanded)
Relation needed for romance
Relation needed to start a romance (-1 disable the control)
Relation needed for a cheating relation
Relation needed for a cheating relation (-1 disable the control)
Relation needed for sexual relation
Relation needed for sexual relation (-1 disable the control)
Improve relation
Improve relation when heroes have sexual relation
Improve (or not) relation during battle
Spouse(s) and other heroes improve relation during battle
With notable
Player character can marry notable
Notify relation improvement in your family
Display relation improvement in your family in the game's message log
Patch MA on load
Save and load the save to apply the patch again
Remove wanderer in tavern if more then
Remove wanderer when loading in tavern if more then (-1 disable the patch)
